alert.note: Alert for Bear Lake Valley; Bear River Range; Franklin, Eastern Oneida Region; Marsh and Arbon Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 8:20PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Line of thunderstorms working west through the Bear River Range toward the Preston region through 915 PM MDT... At 818 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of thunderstorms extending from near Saint Charles south to the Utah line. Movement was west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Brief heavy rain, wind gusts to 40 mph, and occasional lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Preston, Franklin, Oneida Narrows Reservoir, Dayton, Weston, Clifton, Bloomington, Mink Creek, Whitney, Minnetonka Cave, Riverdale and Mapleton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bear Lake Valley; Bear River Range; Franklin, Eastern Oneida Region; Marsh and Arbon Highlands
